title.rendered: Mix it up: Eldorado Stone leads latest mixed-materials trend

content.rendered:
Designers and builders experiment with textures and colors to make unique statement walls

SAN DIEGO, CA – Eldorado Stone, manufacturer of the world’s most believable architectural stone veneer, is leading with an all-new design trend that blends the rustic look of stone with the classic design of brick to create one-of-a-kind designs. Homebuilders and designers are now incorporating these stone and brick blends into their designs, for an endless array of customized possibilities.

“Eldorado Stone leads the market in authenticity and customization,” said Ramsay Hawfield, director of marketing at Eldorado Stone. “Our beautiful, hand-painted and hand-molded stone and brick veneer work together in endless combinations and have inspired a design movement—one that encourages creative and wholly unique applications.”

TWEET THIS: Trend Alert: Designers are combining @EldoradoStone Brick and #StoneVeneer for personalized installations.

The wide variety of mixed-material blending opportunities allows for designers and homeowners to elevate interior and exterior spaces while also remaining true to existing color or design aesthetics. For example, a stone façade can incorporate different profiles to best match other homes in a neighborhood, and interior designers can specify the blend that will best highlight the color and textures found throughout the home.

For more information about Eldorado Stone, please visit eldoradostone.com.

# # #

About Eldorado Stone
Eldorado Stone, LLC is headquartered in San Marcos, Calif. It is a subsidiary of Headwaters Incorporated (NYSE: HW), a world leader in creating value through innovative advancements in the utilization of natural resources. Eldorado Stone currently operates manufacturing facilities in several states with regional distribution centers across the U.S. For more information and to view a gallery of beautiful installations, visit www.eldoradostone.com or call 1-800-925-1491 for a free catalog.
